### ğŸ“š ì£¼ìš” ê¸°ëŠ¥

### ğŸ“š ì½”ë“œ
### ajaxë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•œ ì¸í„°íŒŒí¬ api fetch
```javascript
$.ajax({
		method: "GET",
		url: "http://book.interpark.com/api/bestSeller.api",
		data: {
			key: 'ê°œì¸ í‚¤ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•´ì£¼ì„¸ìš”',
			categoryId: 100, output: 'json', nosniff: "off",
			callback: good
		},
		dataType: "jsonp"
	}).done(function(msg) {
		maxPageNum1 = msg.item.length;

		let list = msg.item;
		// 30ê°œ 
		for (let i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {

			let url = list[i].coverLargeUrl != "" ? list[i].coverLargeUrl
				: "data:image/jpeg;base64,";

			$("#search-result").append(`
		   <div class="book-item bestseller">
			   <div class="item-img">
						  <img class='thumbnail' src=${url} alt=''>
					   </div>
			   <div class="item-desc">
						   <p>ã€${list[i].title}ã€</p>
						   <p>ã€${list[i].description.slice(0, 100)}...ã€</p>
					   	   <p>${list[i].priceStandard}ì›</p>
					   	   <input id="hidden-search-url" value=${list[i].link} type="hidden">
					   </div>
			   </div>
			   `);

		}
		
		$("#search-result").append("<div class='more-container'><button id='item-more1' class='item-more'>ë”ë³´ê¸°</button></div>");

		for(let i = 0; i < 4; i++) {
			$(`#search-result`).children(`.bestseller:eq(${i})`).css("display","block");
		}
	})
```

### ì¹´ì¹´ì˜¤ ì§€ë„ APIë¥¼ í™œìš©í•œ ë‚´ ì£¼ë³€ ì„œì  ì°¾ê¸°
```javascript
	<div class="map-container">
		<div id="map" style="width: 65%; height: 500px;"></div>
		<div id="list-all">
			<h2 style="color: #EBF5FF">ê°€ê¹Œìš´ì„œì </h2>
		</div>
	</div>

	<script src="js/bookstoreinfo.js"></script>

	<script type="text/javascript"
		src="//dapi.kakao.com/v2/maps/sdk.js?appkey=[ê°œì¸í‚¤ë¥¼ ì…ë ¥í•˜ì„¸ìš”]&libraries=services"></script>
	<script>
      var mapContainer = document.getElementById("map"), //Â ì§€ë„ë¥¼Â í‘œì‹œí• Â div
        	mapOption = {
          center: new kakao.maps.LatLng(37.56742261797555, 127.0100117859028), //Â ì§€ë„ì˜Â ì¤‘ì‹¬ì¢Œí‘œ
          level: 3,
          //Â ì§€ë„ì˜Â í™•ëŒ€Â ë ˆë²¨
        };

      //Â ì§€ë„ë¥¼Â ìƒì„±í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
      var map = new kakao.maps.Map(mapContainer, mapOption);

      	if (navigator.geolocation) {
        	//Â GeoLocationì„Â ì´ìš©í•´ì„œÂ ì ‘ì†Â ìœ„ì¹˜ë¥¼Â ì–»ì–´ì˜µë‹ˆë‹¤
        	navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function (position) {
          var lat = position.coords.latitude, //Â ìœ„ë„
            lon = position.coords.longitude; //Â ê²½ë„

          var locPosition = new kakao.maps.LatLng(lat, lon), //Â ë§ˆì»¤ê°€Â í‘œì‹œë Â ìœ„ì¹˜ë¥¼Â geolocationìœ¼ë¡œÂ ì–»ì–´ì˜¨Â ì¢Œí‘œë¡œÂ ìƒì„±í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
            message = '<div style="padding:5px;">í˜„ìœ„ì¹˜</div>'; //Â ì¸í¬ìœˆë„ìš°ì—Â í‘œì‹œë Â ë‚´ìš©ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤

          //Â ë§ˆì»¤ì™€Â ì¸í¬ìœˆë„ìš°ë¥¼Â í‘œì‹œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
          displayMarker(locPosition, message);
        });
      } else {
        //Â HTML5ì˜Â GeoLocationì„Â ì‚¬ìš©í• Â ìˆ˜Â ì—†ì„ë•ŒÂ ë§ˆì»¤Â í‘œì‹œÂ ìœ„ì¹˜ì™€Â ì¸í¬ìœˆë„ìš°Â ë‚´ìš©ì„Â ì„¤ì •í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤

        var locPosition = new kakao.maps.LatLng(33.450701, 126.570667),
          message = "geolocationì„ì‚¬ìš©í• ìˆ˜Â ì—†ì–´ìš”..";

        displayMarker(locPosition, message);
      }

      function displayMarker(locPosition, message) {
        map.setCenter(locPosition);
      }

      // ì£¼ì†Œ-ì¢Œí‘œ ë³€í™˜ ê°ì²´ë¥¼ ìƒì„±í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
      var geocoder = new kakao.maps.services.Geocoder();
      var overlay;
      // ì£¼ì†Œë¡œ ì¢Œí‘œë¥¼ ê²€ìƒ‰í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
      list.map((it) => {
        let name = it.store_name;
        let adres = it.adres;
        let sns = it.sns;
        let tel = it.tel_no == null ? "" : it.tel_no;
        let y = it.ydnts;
        let x = it.xcnts;
        let hmpg = it.hmpg_url;

        geocoder.addressSearch(
          it.adres,

          function (result, status) {
            // ì •ìƒì ìœ¼ë¡œ ê²€ìƒ‰ì´ ì™„ë£Œëìœ¼ë©´
            if (status === kakao.maps.services.Status.OK) {
              var coords = new kakao.maps.LatLng(result[0].y, result[0].x);

              // ê²°ê³¼ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°›ì€ ìœ„ì¹˜ë¥¼ ë§ˆì»¤ë¡œ í‘œì‹œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
              var marker = new kakao.maps.Marker({
                map: map,
                position: coords,
              });
			
             
              var content =
               
            	  sns != null ? 
                	'<div class="wrap">' +
                    '    <div class="info">' +
                    '        <div class="title">' +
                    name +
                    '            <div class="close" onclick="closeOverlay()" title="ë‹«ê¸°"></div>' +
                    "        </div>" +
                    '        <div class="body">' +
                    '            <div class="desc">' +
                    '                <div class="ellipsis">' +
                    adres +
                    "</div>" +
                    "                <div><a href=" +
                    sns +
                    ' class="link">SNS</a></div>' +
                    "                <div><a href=" +
                    hmpg +
                    ' class="link">í™ˆí˜ì´ì§€</a></div>' +
                    '                <div><a class="ellipsis">' +
                    tel +
                    "</a></div>" +
                    "            </div>" +
                    "            </div>" +
                    "        </div>" +
                    "    </div>" +
                    "</div>"
                  : '<div class="wrap">' +
                    '    <div class="info">' +
                    '        <div class="title">' +
                    name +
                    '        <div class="close" onclick="closeOverlay()" title="ë‹«ê¸°"></div>' +
                    "        </div>" +
                    '        <div class="body">' +
                    '            <div class="desc">' +
                    '                <div class="ellipsis">' +
                    adres +
                    "</div>" +
                    '                <div><a class="ellipsis">' +
                    tel +
                    "</a></div>" +
                    "            </div>" +
                    "            </div>" +
                    "        </div>" +
                    "    </div>" +
                    "</div>"

                    
                    
                    
              kakao.maps.event.addListener(marker, "click", function () {
                overlay = new kakao.maps.CustomOverlay({
                  content: content,
                  map: map,
                  position: marker.getPosition(),
                });
                // ë§ˆì»¤ë¥¼ í´ë¦­í–ˆì„ ë•Œ ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ ì˜¤ë²„ë ˆì´ë¥¼ í‘œì‹œí•©ë‹ˆë‹¤
                overlay.setMap(map);
              });
            }
          }
        );
      });

      function getDistance(lat1, lon1, lat2, lon2, unit) {
        var radlat1 = (Math.PI * lat1) / 180;
        var radlat2 = (Math.PI * lat2) / 180;
        var radlon1 = (Math.PI * lon1) / 180;
        var radlon2 = (Math.PI * lon2) / 180;
        var theta = lon1 - lon2;
        var radtheta = (Math.PI * theta) / 180;
        var dist =
          Math.sin(radlat1) * Math.sin(radlat2) +
          Math.cos(radlat1) * Math.cos(radlat2) * Math.cos(radtheta);
        dist = Math.acos(dist);
        dist = (dist * 180) / Math.PI;
        dist = dist * 60 * 1.1515;

        if (unit == "K") {
          dist = dist * 1.609344;
        }
        if (unit == "N") {
          dist = dist * 0.8684;
        }
        return dist;
      }

      navigator.geolocation.getCurrentPosition(function (position) {
        var lat = position.coords.latitude, //Â ìœ„ë„
          lon = position.coords.longitude; //Â ê²½ë„
        console.log("latitude", lat);
        console.log("longitude", lon);

        for (let i = 0; i < list.length; i++) {
          let distance = getDistance(
            lat,
            lon,
            list[i].xcnts,
            list[i].ydnts,
            "K"
          );
          list[i].distance = distance;
        }

        const newList = list.sort(function (a, b) {
          if (a.distance > b.distance) {
            return 1;
          }
          if (a.distance < b.distance) {
            return -1;
          }
          return 0;
        });
 

       for(let i = 0; i < newList.length; i++) {
     	   let store_name= newList[i].store_name;
    	   let tel_no = newList[i].tel_no == null ? "" : newList[i].tel_no; 
    	   let adres2=newList[i].adres;
    	   let adres=newList[i].adres;
    	   let sns= newList[i].sns;
    	   let hmpg=newList[i].hmpg_url;
    	        
         $("#list-all").append(
        		 sns&&hmpg != null ? 
                '<div id="newList"><ol><li>'+store_name+'</li><li>'+tel_no+'</li>'+
                '<li>'+adres2+'</li><li><a href=' +
                sns +
                ' class="link">SNS</a><a href='+hmpg+
                ' class="link">í™ˆí˜ì´ì§€</a></li></ol></div>'
                
                : '<div id="newList"><ol><li>'+store_name+'</li><li>'+tel_no+'</li>'+
                '<li>'+adres+'</li></ol></div>'
                
        
                
             )
  
       }
      }); 

      // ì»¤ìŠ¤í…€ ì˜¤ë²„ë ˆì´ë¥¼ ë‹«ê¸° ìœ„í•´ í˜¸ì¶œë˜ëŠ” í•¨ìˆ˜ì…ë‹ˆë‹¤
      function closeOverlay() {
        overlay.setMap(null);
      }
    </script>
```
